hasAttributes.name: IBANNumber
hasAttributes.description: International Bank Account Number, ISO 13616.

hasAttributes.name: approvedBy
hasAttributes.description: userId (from userListing) for person who approved the entry.

hasAttributes.name: approvedDateTime
hasAttributes.description: The date and time the entry was approved.

hasAttributes.name: bankAccountId
hasAttributes.description: Unambiguous identification of the account to which credit and debit entries are made.

hasAttributes.name: bankAccountName
hasAttributes.description: The name of the individual or company holding the bank account.

hasAttributes.name: bankAccountNumber
hasAttributes.description: The number allocated to the account by the individual’s or company’s own bank.

hasAttributes.name: batchId
hasAttributes.description: System generated ID for batch.

hasAttributes.name: glCreditAccountNumber
hasAttributes.description: GL account number on which the credit side of the transaction has been posted.

hasAttributes.name: glDebitAccountNumber
hasAttributes.description: GL account number on which the debit side of the transaction has been posted.

hasAttributes.name: invoiceAmount
hasAttributes.description: Transaction monetary amount recorded in the functional or group currency. No multicurrency translation should need to be performed on this amount because all transactions should be recorded in a single currency.

hasAttributes.name: invoiceAmountCurrency
hasAttributes.description: Three-letter currency code according to ISO 4217 standard for the functional currency of the entity, e.g. EUR for Euros or USD for American Dollars.

hasAttributes.name: invoiceDate
hasAttributes.description: The date of the invoice, regardless of the date the invoice is entered. This is the date from which the due date is calculated based on the invoice terms.

hasAttributes.name: invoiceNumber
hasAttributes.description: Unique identifier for each invoice, this could be a system generated ID.

hasAttributes.name: lastModifiedBy
hasAttributes.description: userId (from userListing) for the last person modifying this entry.

hasAttributes.name: lastModifiedDateTime
hasAttributes.description: The date and time the entry was last modified before posting.

hasAttributes.name: lineAccountId
hasAttributes.description: General Ledger Account code of the GL purchases account. Can be including sub-account ID. It can contain many different levels to identify the Account. It could include cost centres such as company, division, region, group, branch, department, etc.

hasAttributes.name: lineApprovedBy
hasAttributes.description: userId (from userListing) for person who approved the entry.

hasAttributes.name: lineApprovedDateTime
hasAttributes.description: The date and time the entry was approved.

hasAttributes.name: lineBusinessUnitCode
hasAttributes.description: Used to identify the business unit, region, branch, etc. at the level that financial statements are being audited. Must match the businessUnitCode in the businessUnit table.

hasAttributes.name: lineDebitCreditIndicator
hasAttributes.description: Indicates whether the amount is a credit or debit. 'C'=credit; 'D'=debit.

hasAttributes.name: lineDescription
hasAttributes.description: Description of payment line.

hasAttributes.name: lineLastModifiedDate
hasAttributes.description: The date the entry was last modified.

hasAttributes.name: lineLineNumber
hasAttributes.description: Line item number of the invoice.

hasAttributes.name: lineModifiedBy
hasAttributes.description: userId (from userListing) for the last person modifying this entry.

hasAttributes.name: linePaymentAmountLocal
hasAttributes.description: Amount of the transaction in the local (foreign) currency.

hasAttributes.name: linePaymentAmountLocalCurrency
hasAttributes.description: Three-letter currency code according to ISO 4217 standard for the local (foreign) currency, e.g. EUR for the Euros or USD for American Dollars.

hasAttributes.name: linePaymentAmountReporting
hasAttributes.description: Transaction monetary amount recorded in the reporting currency.

hasAttributes.name: linePaymentAmountReportingCurrency
hasAttributes.description: Three-letter currency code according to ISO 4217 for the currency in which a reporting entity prepares its financial statements, e.g. EUR for the Euros or USD for American Dollars.

hasAttributes.name: linePaymentLineAmount
hasAttributes.description: Transaction monetary amount recorded in the functional currency. No multicurrency translation should need to be performed on this amount because all transactions should be recorded in a single currency. Must be absolute.

hasAttributes.name: linePaymentLineAmountCurrency
hasAttributes.description: Three-letter currency code according to ISO 4217 standard for the functional currency of the entity, e.g. EUR for Euros or USD for American Dollars.

hasAttributes.name: linePaymentLineAmountExchangeRate
hasAttributes.description: The exchange rate used. Currency Amount x Exchange Rate = Amount.

hasAttributes.name: lineSettlementAmountLocal
hasAttributes.description: Amount of the transaction in the local (foreign) currency.

hasAttributes.name: lineSettlementAmountLocalCurrency
hasAttributes.description: Three-letter currency code according to ISO 4217 standard for the local (foreign) currency, e.g. EUR for the Euros or USD for American Dollars.

hasAttributes.name: lineSettlementPaymentMechanism
hasAttributes.description: Payment mechanism, e.g. cash, cheque or bank transfer.

hasAttributes.name: lineSettlementSettlementAmount
hasAttributes.description: Transaction monetary amount recorded in the functional currency. No multicurrency translation should need to be performed on this amount because all transactions should be recorded in a single currency. Must be absolute.

hasAttributes.name: lineSettlementSettlementAmountExchangeRate
hasAttributes.description: The exchange rate used. Currency Amount x Exchange Rate = Amount.

hasAttributes.name: lineSettlementSettlementDate
hasAttributes.description: The date settled.

hasAttributes.name: lineSettlementSettlementDiscount
hasAttributes.description: Description Settlement / Other Discount.

hasAttributes.name: lineSourceDocumentId
hasAttributes.description: The source document to which the line relates.

hasAttributes.name: lineSupplierId
hasAttributes.description: Identifier of the supplier to whom payment has been made. Must match the supplierId in the supplierMasterData.

hasAttributes.name: lineSystemEntryDateTime
hasAttributes.description: The date the transaction was entered into the system. This is sometimes referred to as the creation date. This should be a system-generated date (rather than user-entered date), when possible. This date does not necessarily correspond with the date of the transaction itself.

hasAttributes.name: lineSystemEntryUser
hasAttributes.description: userId (from userListing) for person who created the record.

hasAttributes.name: lineTaxInformationTaxAmount
hasAttributes.description: Transaction monetary amount recorded in the functional currency. No multicurrency translation should need to be performed on this amount because all transactions should be recorded in a single currency. Must be absolute.

hasAttributes.name: lineTaxInformationTaxAmountExchangeRate
hasAttributes.description: The exchange rate used. Currency Amount x Exchange Rate = Amount.

hasAttributes.name: lineTaxInformationTaxAmountLocal
hasAttributes.description: Amount of the transaction in the local (foreign) currency.

hasAttributes.name: lineTaxInformationTaxAmountLocalCurrency
hasAttributes.description: Three-letter currency code according to ISO 4217 standard for the local (foreign) currency, e.g. EUR for the Euros or USD for American Dollars.

hasAttributes.name: lineTaxInformationTaxBase
hasAttributes.description: The base on which the tax is calculated. This can be an amount or a quantity, e.g. litres.

hasAttributes.name: lineTaxInformationTaxBaseDescription
hasAttributes.description: Description of the value in the tax base, e.g. litres for excises on alcoholic beverages.

hasAttributes.name: lineTaxInformationTaxCode
hasAttributes.description: Tax code for lookup in tables.

hasAttributes.name: lineTaxInformationTaxDeclarationPeriod
hasAttributes.description: The identification of the period of the declaration/return in which the tax amount is reported to the revenue body.

hasAttributes.name: lineTaxInformationTaxExemptionReason
hasAttributes.description: Tax exemption or reduction reason or rationale.

hasAttributes.name: lineTaxInformationTaxPercentage
hasAttributes.description: Tax percentage.

hasAttributes.name: lineTaxInformationTaxType
hasAttributes.description: Tax type for look-up in tables.

hasAttributes.name: lineTaxPointDate
hasAttributes.description: Tax point date where recorded or, if not recorded, then the invoice date.

hasAttributes.name: paymentAmount
hasAttributes.description: Transaction monetary amount recorded in the functional currency. No multicurrency translation should need to be performed on this amount because all transactions should be recorded in a single currency. Must be absolute.

hasAttributes.name: paymentAmountCurrency
hasAttributes.description: Three-letter currency code according to ISO 4217 standard for the functional currency of the entity, e.g. for Euros or USD for American Dollars.

hasAttributes.name: paymentAmountDebitCreditIndicator
hasAttributes.description: Indicates whether the amount is a credit or debit. 'C'=credit; 'D'=debit.

hasAttributes.name: paymentAmountLocal
hasAttributes.description: Amount of the payment in the local (foreign) currency.

hasAttributes.name: paymentAmountLocalCurrency
hasAttributes.description: Three-letter currency code according to ISO 4217 standard for the local (foreign) currency, e.g. EUR for the Euros or USD for American Dollars.

hasAttributes.name: paymentAmountReporting
hasAttributes.description: Transaction monetary amount recorded in the reporting currency.

hasAttributes.name: paymentAmountReportingCurrency
hasAttributes.description: Three-letter currency code according to ISO 4217 for the currency in which a reporting entity prepares its financial statements, e.g. EUR for the Euros or USD for American Dollars.

hasAttributes.name: paymentDescription
hasAttributes.description: Description of the payment.

hasAttributes.name: paymentId
hasAttributes.description: Unique identifier for each payment made. This ID may need to be created by concatenating fields (e.g. supplier and payment number) to uniquely identify each transaction.

hasAttributes.name: paymentMethod
hasAttributes.description: The code value or indicator of the method by which the transaction debit or credit amount was extinguished or apportioned to the debt by the supplier, e.g. check, wire transfer, cash, etc.

hasAttributes.name: paymentRefNo
hasAttributes.description: External reference number for each payment made, e.g. payment reference at bank or with the supplier.

hasAttributes.name: period
hasAttributes.description: Fiscal period in which the transactionDate occurs, e.g. W1-W53 for weekly periods, M1-M12 for monthly periods, and Q1-Q4 for quarterly periods.

hasAttributes.name: periodYear
hasAttributes.description: Fiscal year in which the transactionDate occurs.

hasAttributes.name: postingStatus
hasAttributes.description: Status of the transaction's posting to the GL, e.g. "Posted" or "Not Posted".

hasAttributes.name: referenceDate
hasAttributes.description: The date on an externally generated transaction, e.g. check date or wire transfer date.

hasAttributes.name: segment01
hasAttributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

hasAttributes.name: segment02
hasAttributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

hasAttributes.name: segment03
hasAttributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

hasAttributes.name: segment04
hasAttributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

hasAttributes.name: segment05
hasAttributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

hasAttributes.name: sourceId
hasAttributes.description: Posting source: code for source from which the journal entry originated, e.g. sales journal, cash receipts journal, general journal, payroll journal, accountant manual entry, spreadsheet, etc.

hasAttributes.name: supplierId
hasAttributes.description: Identifier of the supplier to whom payment has been made. Must match the supplierId in the supplierMasterData.

hasAttributes.name: systemEntryDateTime
hasAttributes.description: The date the transaction was entered into the system. This is sometimes referred to as the creation date. This should be a system-generated date (rather than user-entered date), when possible. This date does not necessarily correspond with the date of the transaction itself.

hasAttributes.name: systemEntryUser
hasAttributes.description: userId (from userListing) for person who created the record.

hasAttributes.name: systemId
hasAttributes.description: Unique number created by the system for the document.

hasAttributes.name: transactionDate
hasAttributes.description: The date the payment was made or credit was applied.

hasAttributes.name: transactionId
hasAttributes.description: Cross-reference to GL posting. It can contain many different levels to identify the transaction. It could include cost centres such as company, division, region, group, branch, department, etc.

hasAttributes.name: userDefined1
hasAttributes.description: Having a function or role that is defined and gets varied from user to user.

hasAttributes.name: userDefined2
hasAttributes.description: Having a function or role that is defined and gets varied from user to user.

hasAttributes.name: adjustmentAmount
hasAttributes.description: Adjustment amount for the goods received due to quality or quantity issues.

hasAttributes.name: adjustmentDescription
hasAttributes.description: If an adjustment to the receipt, a description of the reason for the adjustment.

hasAttributes.name: adjustmentIndicator
hasAttributes.description: "0" if the transaction is the original shipment transaction, "1" if the transaction is a shipment adjustment.

hasAttributes.name: approvedBy
hasAttributes.description: userId (from userListing) for person who approved the entry.

hasAttributes.name: approvedByDateTime
hasAttributes.description: The date and time the entry was approved.

hasAttributes.name: businessUnitCode
hasAttributes.description: Used to identify the business unit, region, branch, etc. at the level that financial statements are being audited and for which the trial balance is generated. For example, you may use a code aligned with the concept of a reportable segment as defined in FASB Accounting Standards Codification (ASC) 280, Segment Reporting.

hasAttributes.name: enteredBy
hasAttributes.description: userId (from userListing) for person who created the record.

hasAttributes.name: enteredDateTime
hasAttributes.description: The date the transaction was entered into the system. This is sometimes referred to as the creation date. This should be a system-generated date (rather than user-entered date), when possible. This date does not necessarily correspond with the date of the transaction itself.

hasAttributes.name: goodsReceiptUniqueId
hasAttributes.description: The system-generated unique ID when the goods are received.

hasAttributes.name: goodsReceivedAmount
hasAttributes.description: Total value of the goods received in the functional currency.

hasAttributes.name: goodsReceivedCurrency
hasAttributes.description: Three-letter currency code according to ISO 4217 standard for the functional currency of the entity, e.g. EUR for Euros or USD for American Dollars.

hasAttributes.name: goodsReceivedExchangeRate
hasAttributes.description: The exchange rate used. Currency Amount x Exchange Rate = Amount.

hasAttributes.name: goodsReceivedLocalAmount
hasAttributes.description: The goods received amount recorded in the local (foreign) currency.

hasAttributes.name: goodsReceivedLocalCurrency
hasAttributes.description: Three-letter currency code according to ISO 4217 standard for the local (foreign) currency, e.g. EUR for the Euros or USD for American Dollars.

hasAttributes.name: lastModifiedBy
hasAttributes.description: userId (from userListing) for the last person modifying this entry.

hasAttributes.name: lastModifiedDateTime
hasAttributes.description: The date and time the entry was last modified before posting.

hasAttributes.name: lineAdjustmentAmount
hasAttributes.description: The adjustment amount for the corresponding line item.

hasAttributes.name: lineAdjustmentDescription
hasAttributes.description: The adjustment description for the corresponding line item.

hasAttributes.name: lineAmount
hasAttributes.description: Transaction monetary amount recorded in the functional currency. No multicurrency translation should need to be performed on this amount because all transactions should be recorded in a single currency. Must be absolute.

hasAttributes.name: lineAmountLocal
hasAttributes.description: Amount of the transaction in the local (foreign) currency.

hasAttributes.name: lineAmountLocalCurrency
hasAttributes.description: Three-letter currency code according to ISO 4217 standard for the local (foreign) currency, e.g. for the Euros or USD for American Dollars.

hasAttributes.name: lineExchangeRate
hasAttributes.description: The exchange rate used. Currency Amount x Exchange Rate = Amount.

hasAttributes.name: linePurchaseOrderAmount
hasAttributes.description: The amount for this line item as recorded in the corresponding Purchase Order.

hasAttributes.name: linePurchaseOrderAmountLocal
hasAttributes.description: Order amount in the local (foreign) currency.

hasAttributes.name: linePurchaseOrderAmountLocalCurrency
hasAttributes.description: Three-letter currency code according to ISO 4217 standard for the local (foreign) currency, e.g. EUR for the Euros or USD for American Dollars.

hasAttributes.name: linePurchaseOrderExchangeRate
hasAttributes.description: The Exchange rate for this line item as recorded in the corresponding Purchase Order.

hasAttributes.name: linePurchaseOrderLineId
hasAttributes.description: Identifier for purchase order line number. Must match lineLineNumber used in purchaseOrderData. If no purchase order, leave blank.

hasAttributes.name: linePurchaseOrderQuantity
hasAttributes.description: Purchase order line quantity. If no purchase order, leave blank.

hasAttributes.name: linePurchaseOrderUnitOfMeasure
hasAttributes.description: Purchase order line base unit of measure. If no purchase order, leave blank.

hasAttributes.name: linePurchaseOrderUnitPrice
hasAttributes.description: Purchase order line price per unit. If no purchase order, leave blank.

hasAttributes.name: lineReceiptDocumentLineId
hasAttributes.description: Reference line number on receipt document.

hasAttributes.name: lineReceiptId
hasAttributes.description: Unique identifier for each shipment received. This ID may need to be created by concatenating fields (e.g. document number, document type, and year) to uniquely identify each shipment.

hasAttributes.name: lineReceiptProductBarcode
hasAttributes.description: UPC or other general identifier.

hasAttributes.name: lineReceiptProductDescription
hasAttributes.description: Product description (plain language) to indicate the name or other identifying characteristics of the product.

hasAttributes.name: lineReceiptProductGroup01
hasAttributes.description: Product descriptor #1, e.g. tyres or accessories.

hasAttributes.name: lineReceiptProductGroup02
hasAttributes.description: Product descriptor #2, e.g. brand.

hasAttributes.name: lineReceiptProductId
hasAttributes.description: Identifier that is unique for each product.

hasAttributes.name: lineReceiptQuantity
hasAttributes.description: Item quantity received.

hasAttributes.name: lineReceiptStandardUnitPrices
hasAttributes.description: Standard price per unit of the goods received.

hasAttributes.name: lineReceiptUnitOfMeasure
hasAttributes.description: Base unit of measure.

hasAttributes.name: lineReceiptUnitPrice
hasAttributes.description: Price per unit for item received.

hasAttributes.name: movementType
hasAttributes.description: Specifies the type of goods movement. This will default to the correct code according to selections made in the header, e.g. goods receipt for purchase order onto UoL premises, reversal of the goods receipt for purchase order, Return the delivery to the sender, especially useful if you need to accurately track and document the specific nature of each goods transaction in  inventory management system .

hasAttributes.name: postingStatus
hasAttributes.description: Status of the transaction's posting to the GL, e.g. "Posted" or "Not Posted".

hasAttributes.name: purchaseOrderAmount
hasAttributes.description: The Amount for this receipt as recorded in the corresponding Purchase Order.

hasAttributes.name: purchaseOrderAmountLocal
hasAttributes.description: Order amount in the local (foreign) currency.

hasAttributes.name: purchaseOrderAmountLocalCurrency
hasAttributes.description: Three-letter currency code according to ISO 4217 standard for the local (foreign) currency, e.g. EUR for the Euros or USD for American Dollars.

hasAttributes.name: purchaseOrderDate
hasAttributes.description: The date of the purchase order relating to the goods received.

hasAttributes.name: purchaseOrderExchangeRate
hasAttributes.description: Exchange rate listed on the purchase order relating to the goods received.

hasAttributes.name: purchaseOrderId
hasAttributes.description: Unique identifier for each purchase order. Must match purchaseOrderUniqueID in the purchaseOrderData file. If no purchase order, leave blank.

hasAttributes.name: receiptDate
hasAttributes.description: The date of receipt (date received).

hasAttributes.name: receiptDocumentId
hasAttributes.description: Reference number on receipt shipping document (company reference or logistics company identifier).

hasAttributes.name: receiptFiscalYear
hasAttributes.description: Fiscal year in which the receiptDate occurs.

hasAttributes.name: receiptId
hasAttributes.description: Unique identifier for goods or services received. This ID may need to be created by concatenating fields (e.g. customer and payment number) to uniquely identify each transaction.

hasAttributes.name: receiptPeriod
hasAttributes.description: Fiscal period in which the receiptDate occurs, e.g. W1-W53 for weekly periods, M1-M12 for monthly periods, and Q1-Q4 for quarterly periods.

hasAttributes.name: segment01
hasAttributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

hasAttributes.name: segment02
hasAttributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

hasAttributes.name: segment03
hasAttributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

hasAttributes.name: segment04
hasAttributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

hasAttributes.name: segment05
hasAttributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

hasAttributes.name: supplierId
hasAttributes.description: Identifier of the supplier to whom payment is due. Must match the supplierId in the supplierMasterData.

hasAttributes.name: userDefined1
hasAttributes.description: Having a function or role that is defined and gets varied from user to user.

hasAttributes.name: userDefined2
hasAttributes.description: Having a function or role that is defined and gets varied from user to user.

hasAttributes.name: accountId
hasAttributes.description: accountId associated with supplier company/supplier books of accounts used to identify the entity. The entity's customer number in the supplier's records.

hasAttributes.name: businessUnitCode
hasAttributes.description: Used to identify the business unit, region, branch, etc. at the level that financial statements are being audited and for which the trial balance is generated. For example, you may use a code aligned with the concept of a reportable segment as defined in FASB Accounting Standards Codification (ASC) 280, Segment Reporting.

hasAttributes.name: companyType
hasAttributes.description: Type of company of the vendor/supplier, e.g. B2B, B2C, manufacturing, limited company or similar.

hasAttributes.name: creditNoteAmount
hasAttributes.description: Credit note Amount reference (where applicable) to original invoice.

hasAttributes.name: creditNoteReason
hasAttributes.description: Credit note reason or rationale.

hasAttributes.name: creditNoteReference
hasAttributes.description: Credit note reference (where applicable) to original invoice.

hasAttributes.name: description
hasAttributes.description: Description of the Invoice.

hasAttributes.name: discountAmountAvailable
hasAttributes.description: Discount amount available on the invoice.

hasAttributes.name: discountBase
hasAttributes.description: The base on which the discount is calculated. This can be an amount or a quantity, e.g. litres.

hasAttributes.name: discountTaken
hasAttributes.description: Discount amount taken during payment of invoice.

hasAttributes.name: documentType
hasAttributes.description: Type of document which forms the basis of the record, e.g. supply invoice, credit note, etc.

hasAttributes.name: excessPayment
hasAttributes.description: Any excess payment beyond the total amount due will be displayed.

hasAttributes.name: fiscalYear
hasAttributes.description: Fiscal year in which invoiceDate occurs.

hasAttributes.name: fiscalperiod
hasAttributes.description: Fiscal period in which the invoiceDate occurs, e.g. W1-W53 for weekly periods, M1-M12 for monthly periods, and Q1-Q4 for quarterly periods.

hasAttributes.name: glAccountNumber
hasAttributes.description: Identifier for the GL account code associated with the payable. glAccountNumber in this file must match the glAccountNumber used in the glDetail, trialBalance and chartOfAccounts

hasAttributes.name: invoiceAmount
hasAttributes.description: Transaction monetary amount recorded in the functional currency. No multicurrency translation should need to be performed on this amount because all transactions should be recorded in a single currency. Must be absolute.

hasAttributes.name: invoiceAmountCurrency
hasAttributes.description: Three-letter currency code according to ISO 4217 standard for the functional currency of the entity, e.g. EUR for Euros or USD for American Dollars.

hasAttributes.name: invoiceAmountLocal
hasAttributes.description: Invoice amount in the local (foreign) currency.

hasAttributes.name: invoiceAmountLocalCurrency
hasAttributes.description: Three-letter currency code according to ISO 4217 standard for the local (foreign) currency, e.g. EUR for the Euros or USD for American Dollars.

hasAttributes.name: invoiceAmountReporting
hasAttributes.description: Transaction monetary amount recorded in the reporting currency.

hasAttributes.name: invoiceAmountReportingCurrency
hasAttributes.description: Three-letter currency code according to ISO 4217 for the currency in which a reporting entity prepares its financial statements, e.g. EUR for the Euros or USD for American Dollars.

hasAttributes.name: invoiceDate
hasAttributes.description: The date of the invoice, regardless of the date the invoice is entered. This is the date from which the due date is calculated based on the invoice terms.

hasAttributes.name: invoiceDocumentReference
hasAttributes.description: The reference number (invoice number) on the purchase invoice, the reference number provided by the supplier.

hasAttributes.name: invoiceDueDate
hasAttributes.description: The date payment is due from the Supplier. Aging of a payable is usually calculated based on this date.

hasAttributes.name: invoiceId
hasAttributes.description: Unique identifier for each invoice. This ID may need to be created by concatenating fields (e.g. document number, document type, and year) to uniquely identify each transaction. The same ID must be used for all tables with invoice data.

hasAttributes.name: invoiceNumber
hasAttributes.description: Identification number for an externally generated invoice.

hasAttributes.name: invoicePrepaymentAmount
hasAttributes.description: Prepayment amount on the invoice.

hasAttributes.name: invoiceType
hasAttributes.description: Type of invoice, e.g. debit invoice, credit invoice, cash, ticket, etc.

hasAttributes.name: paymentAmountExchangeRate
hasAttributes.description: The exchange rate used. Currency Amount x Exchange Rate = Amount.

hasAttributes.name: paymentAmountLocal
hasAttributes.description: Transaction amount in the local (foreign) currency.

hasAttributes.name: paymentAmountLocalCurrency
hasAttributes.description: Three-letter currency code according to ISO 4217 standard for the local (foreign) currency, e.g. EUR for the Euros or USD for American Dollars.

hasAttributes.name: paymentAmountReporting
hasAttributes.description: Transaction monetary amount recorded in the reporting currency.

hasAttributes.name: paymentAmountReportingCurrency
hasAttributes.description: Three-letter currency code according to ISO 4217 for the currency in which a reporting entity prepares its financial statements, e.g. EUR for the Euros or USD for American Dollars.

hasAttributes.name: paymentDate
hasAttributes.description: The date on the which the payment is made to the supplier.

hasAttributes.name: paymentDiscountDays
hasAttributes.description: The number of days from the invoice date the vendor allows to take advantage of discounted terms. Terms are represented as digits with no decimal places, e.g. nnn.

hasAttributes.name: paymentDiscountPercentage
hasAttributes.description: The discount percentage the supplier may provide if an invoice is paid before a certain number of days.

hasAttributes.name: paymentDueDays
hasAttributes.description: The number of days allowed to meet the obligation before an invoice becomes overdue.

hasAttributes.name: paymentId
hasAttributes.description: Unique identifier for each payment made. This ID may need to be created by concatenating fields (e.g. customer and payment number) to uniquely identify each transaction.

hasAttributes.name: paymentMethod
hasAttributes.description: The code value or indicator of the method by which the transaction debit or credit amount was extinguished or apportioned to the debt by the supplier, e.g. check, wire transfer, cash, etc. Must match the paymentMethod in apPaymentData.

hasAttributes.name: paymentRefNo
hasAttributes.description: External reference number for each payment made, e.g. payment reference at bank or with the supplier.

hasAttributes.name: postingDate
hasAttributes.description: The date on which the invoice is posted in the system/ERP.

hasAttributes.name: purchaseOrderDate
hasAttributes.description: The date on which purchase order is created.

hasAttributes.name: purchaseOrderId
hasAttributes.description: Unique identifier for each purchase order. Must match orderNo in purchaseOrderData. If no purchase order, leave blank.

hasAttributes.name: registrationNumber
hasAttributes.description: Unique number to identify the company in the accounting records, issued by a government authority or created by the company for internal purposes to identify different entities within their corporate group.

hasAttributes.name: supplierCreditLimit
hasAttributes.description: The credit limit for the total outstanding balance approved for the supplier.

hasAttributes.name: supplierId
hasAttributes.description: Identifier of the supplier to whom payment is due. Must match the supplierId in the supplierMasterData.

hasAttributes.name: supplierName
hasAttributes.description: The name of the vendor/supplier.

hasAttributes.name: taxInformationTaxAmount
hasAttributes.description: Transaction monetary amount recorded in the functional currency. No multicurrency translation should need to be performed on this amount because all transactions should be recorded in a single currency. Must be absolute.

hasAttributes.name: taxInformationTaxAmountExchangeRate
hasAttributes.description: The exchange rate used. Currency Amount x Exchange Rate = Amount.

hasAttributes.name: taxInformationTaxAmountLocal
hasAttributes.description: Transaction amount in the local (foreign) currency.

hasAttributes.name: taxInformationTaxAmountLocalCurrency
hasAttributes.description: Three-letter currency code according to ISO 4217 standard for the local (foreign) currency, e.g. EUR for the Euros or USD for American Dollars.

hasAttributes.name: taxInformationTaxBase
hasAttributes.description: Description of the value in the tax base, e.g. litres for excises on alcoholic beverages.

hasAttributes.name: taxInformationTaxBaseDescription
hasAttributes.description: Description of the value in the tax base, e.g. litres for excises on alcoholic beverages.

hasAttributes.name: taxInformationTaxCode
hasAttributes.description: Tax code for lookup in tables.

hasAttributes.name: taxInformationTaxExemptionReason
hasAttributes.description: Tax exemption or reduction reason or rationale.

hasAttributes.name: taxInformationTaxPercentage
hasAttributes.description: Tax percentage.

hasAttributes.name: taxRegistrationNumber
hasAttributes.description: The supplier's tax identification number.

hasAttributes.name: transactionId
hasAttributes.description: Cross-reference to GL posting. It can contain many different levels to identify the transaction. It could include cost centres such as company, division, region, group, branch, department, etc.

hasAttributes.name: userDefined1
hasAttributes.description: Having a function or role that is defined and gets varied from user to user.

hasAttributes.name: userDefined2
hasAttributes.description: Having a function or role that is defined and gets varied from user to user.

hasAttributes.name: withholdingTaxAmount
hasAttributes.description: Amount of Tax withheld as per the law.

hasAttributes.name: withholdingTaxBaseAmount
hasAttributes.description: The base on which the withholding tax is calculated.

hasAttributes.name: withholdingTaxCode
hasAttributes.description: Withholding tax code only controls the percentage rate of the withholding tax.

hasAttributes.name: withholdingTaxCountry
hasAttributes.description: The withholding tax country of the individual or company to which payment is made.

hasAttributes.name: withholdingTaxExempt
hasAttributes.description: Withholding tax exemption or reduction reason or rationale.

hasAttributes.name: withholdingTaxType
hasAttributes.description: The withholding tax type on the nature of payment for services availed, like payment to contractor, profession services, etc.
